about_the_game:
BlazeRush: Star Track is a dynamic arcade survival racing game in a new space-themed setting. Here you can gather a team of friends, playing in local or online multiplayer. Choose a car to your taste and chase, blow up and cut your opponents off — welcome to the world of racing and frantic fun!

The update features


  • A campaign that includes 30 missions
  • New type of vehicles — spaceships
  • New types of weapons: laser, mines and chain lightning
  • Special space-themed race track for multiplayer
  • New powerful enemy — a massive spaceship

This content requires the base game "BlazeRush" in order to play.
detailed_description:
BlazeRush: Star Track is a dynamic arcade survival racing game in a new space-themed setting. Here you can gather a team of friends, playing in local or online multiplayer. Choose a car to your taste and chase, blow up and cut your opponents off — welcome to the world of racing and frantic fun!

The update features


  • A campaign that includes 30 missions
  • New type of vehicles — spaceships
  • New types of weapons: laser, mines and chain lightning
  • Special space-themed race track for multiplayer
  • New powerful enemy — a massive spaceship

This content requires the base game "BlazeRush" in order to play.
legal_notice: Developed and published by Targem Games. All rights reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel Pentium-4 / AMD Athlon II
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel Pentium-4 / AMD Athlon II
  • Graphics: 1 GB NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750 / Intel HD 4000 and newer

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard (10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel HD 3000, HD 4000
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel integrated graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Snow Leopard (10.8.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Graphics: 1 GB NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750 / Intel HD 4000 and newer
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel integrated graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks

name: BlazeRush - Star Track

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel Pentium-4 / AMD Athlon II
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon64 X2 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750 / Intel HD 4000 and newer
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
